system.sustained: Psyker makes Opposed Willpower test against living creature with an Intelligence characteristic higher than 15 within range. If Psyker succeeds, tartget is stunned for 1 round, +1 per three degrees of success psyker won opposed test by. Creature treats Psyker as if they have Fear (2) (-10 Fear Test) for remainder of encounter, seeing them as a living conduit of the God-Emperor. This technique can only be used once per encounter on any particular foe.
